attributes.action: I would like the UK government to decriminalise cannabis for 18 years and over.
attributes.additional_details:
Taxation and legalization of cannabis and cannabis medication.
Up to 9 plants would be tolerated for private use.
Taxation could pay for roads and infrastructure.
Any laws on cannabis should be reviewed.
Crime does not pay,but bullying attitude by police officers will not be tolerated.There must be a review of this plant.(medication.)for private and recreation  use.
attributes.background:
Taxation and tollerence of cannabis in public and private.
Or total decriminalisation of cannabis.
Law is too harsh,thus causing warping in government.
Hash and cannabis flower is legal in many country's and states in the USA.i think we should promote a more positive attitude to this product.
